QuestData.Title: The Ladder
QuestData.Description:
Within the Theater of Pain, $Gbrother:sister;, legends rise like cream to the top.
Listen to me, $Gbrother:sister;. If you have the courage to step into that sacred arena, you're going to face the greatest threats in all of existence! The cards will be stacked against you, but only those who can work together will emerge as champions.
Gather your team and meet this challenge head on! Enter the Theater of Pain and defeat the opponents within! Prove that you can rise to the top!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa opponents within the Theater of Pain.
QuestData.RewardText:
Well fought, $Gbrother:sister;! You've begun your rise to the top!
But keep up with your training and stay ready. In Maldraxxus, there is always a challenger waiting to take your place.
